system.description:
This spell-song allows the bard to temporarily enchant one missile attack per round while singing and playing an instrument. The bard must succeed in all required checks to maintain the song.

Effects:

  • One arrow, quarrel, or sling stone per round is enchanted.
  • The enchanted missile gains +4 to hit.
  • The missile can damage creatures normally immune to non-silvered or non-magical weapons.

Duration:

  • The bard may continue this song for a maximum number of rounds equal to their Constitution score.
  • After reaching this limit, the bard passes out for [[/r 1d4 #Hours Unconscious]] hours.
  • If the bard stops singing before reaching their limit, there are no negative effects.
system.effect: Enhances one missile attack per round
